segment.source: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO
segment.target: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO

segment.source: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO
segment.target: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO

segment.source: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO
segment.target: Delegate Management of a Controlled GPO

segment.source: An Approver can delegate the management of a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) that was created by that Approver.
segment.target: An Approver can delegate the management of a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) that was created by that Approver.

segment.source: Like an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), the Approver can delegate access to such a GPO so that selected Editors can edit it, Reviewers can review it, and other Approvers can approve it.
segment.target: Like an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), the Approver can delegate access to such a GPO so that selected Editors can edit it, Reviewers can review it, and other Approvers can approve it.

segment.source: By default, an Approver cannot delegate access to GPOs created by another Group Policy administrator.
segment.target: By default, an Approver cannot delegate access to GPOs created by another Group Policy administrator.

segment.source: A user account with the AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role, the user account of the Approver who created the GPO, or a user account with the necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role, the user account of the Approver who created the GPO, or a user account with the necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To delegate the management of a controlled GPO
segment.target: To delegate the management of a controlled GPO

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab in the details pane, click the Controlled tab to display controlled GPOs, and then click the GPO to delegate:
segment.target: On the Contents tab in the details pane, click the Controlled tab to display controlled GPOs, and then click the GPO to delegate:

segment.source: To add access for a user or group, click the Add button, select the user or group, and click OK.
segment.target: To add access for a user or group, click the Add button, select the user or group, and click OK.

segment.source: In the Add Group or User dialog box, select a role and click OK.
segment.target: In the Add Group or User dialog box, select a role and click OK.

segment.source: To remove access for a user or group, select the user or group, and then click the Remove button.
segment.target: To remove access for a user or group, select the user or group, and then click the Remove button.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If a user or group inherits domain-wide access, the Remove button is unavailable.
segment.target: If a user or group inherits domain-wide access, the Remove button is unavailable.

segment.source: You can modify domain-wide access on the Domain Delegation tab.
segment.target: You can modify domain-wide access on the Domain Delegation tab.

segment.source: To modify the roles and permissions delegated to a user or group, click the Advanced button.
segment.target: To modify the roles and permissions delegated to a user or group, click the Advanced button.

segment.source: In the Permissions dialog box, select the user or group, select the check box for each role to be assigned to that user or group, and then click OK.
segment.target: In the Permissions dialog box, select the user or group, select the check box for each role to be assigned to that user or group, and then click OK.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Editor and Approver include Reviewer permissions.
segment.target: Editor and Approver include Reviewer permissions.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be the Approver who created or controlled the GPO or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be the Approver who created or controlled the GPO or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents permission for the domain and Modify Security permission for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents permission for the domain and Modify Security permission for the GPO.

segment.source: To delegate read access to Group Policy administrators who use AGPM, you must grant them List Contents as well as Read Settings permissions.
segment.target: To delegate read access to Group Policy administrators who use AGPM, you must grant them List Contents as well as Read Settings permissions.

segment.source: This enables them to view GPOs on the Contents tab of AGPM.
segment.target: This enables them to view GPOs on the Contents tab of AGPM.

segment.source: Other permissions must be explicitly delegated.
segment.target: Other permissions must be explicitly delegated.

segment.source: Editors must have Read permission for the deployed copy of a GPO to make full use of Group Policy Software Installation.
segment.target: Editors must have Read permission for the deployed copy of a GPO to make full use of Group Policy Software Installation.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
segment.target: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
